name: Glitch
summary: 午夜凌晨，警长詹姆斯•海斯被呼叫至当地的墓园，突然眼前发生的一切彻底颠覆了他的世界观，六个死去的人赤裸着身体从墓穴里爬了出来.....When Senior Constable James Hayes, a police officer in the small town of Yoorana, is called out to the local cemetery in the middle of the night, he makes a discovery that turns his world upside down. Six people have inexplicably risen from the dead in perfect health.
